summary: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Anushka Sharma|Vinay Pathak|M.K. Raina|Manmeet Singh|Kajol|Rani Mukerji|Preity Zinta|Bipasha Basu|Lara Dutta|Bobby Bedii|Vivan Bhatena|Puneet Cheema|Alene D'Souza|Aneesha Dalal|Areesz Ganddi|Rajesh Jais|Vineet Kapoor|Amit Singh Kharbanda|Isha Koppikar|Darshi Mashru|Shonali Nagrani|Richa Pallod|Rushad Rana|Mark Sagato|Nilofar Salehi|Muneesh Sappel|Rohit Siobti|Karan Tacker|Anuj Tikku
title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
